advertisement

Tomorrow has been declared  by Pennsylvania Gov PERIOD Ed Rendell PERIOD

More than  prospective students and their families are invited to participate at any of Penn States various campus locations PERIOD

Penn State Day will recognize the universitys many contributions to Pennsylvania PERIOD

It is a statewide celebration of the universitys active role in the community and will acknowledge the partnerships between each of the undergraduate campuses and their contributions to the Penn State tradition PERIOD

 said David Kuskowski director of recruitment for the Office of Undergraduate Admissions PERIOD

In his Penn State Day statement Rendell said the university operates 

The university serves an average of one in every two households in Pennsylvania he added PERIOD

Most of tomorrows celebratory events will be held at the nonUniversity Park Penn State campuses PERIOD

 Cindy Hall director of the Department of University Marketing and Advertising said PERIOD

Tomorrows events at University Park will be mainly for prospective students PERIOD

The day will function as an open house during which there will be campus tours and presentations for families and Centre County community members to learn more about the university PERIOD

The events scheduled differ from campus to campus around the state PERIOD

 Kuskowski said PERIOD 

He added that the celebration is designed to unify all of the Penn State campuses PERIOD

 Kuskowski said PERIOD 

Tomorrow will be the first official Penn State Day celebration in Penn State history PERIOD Judy Maxwell assistant in the Department of Governmental Affairs said its timing purposely coincides with the celebration of the Penn States one hundred and fiftieth birthday PERIOD

Kuskowski said the decorations and atmosphere of the Halloween holiday should make Penn State Day even more fun for visiting families and friends PERIOD
